data_list.caption: It is evening, a great mountain looms, with the sun resting on its waist. In the style of traditional Chinese landscape painting.

Towering green mountains, a long white waterfall plunging down, a deep emerald pool below, gray-brown boulders scattered around, and a thin veil of mist drifting in the air. In the style of traditional Chinese landscape painting.
Withered vines, an old tree, and dusk crows. In the style of traditional Chinese landscape painting.
A lone fisherman in a straw raincoat rows his small boat on a misty river, surrounded by distant peaks fading into fog. In the style of traditional Chinese landscape painting.
Snow blankets silent mountains, pine trees stand tall under heavy white caps, a frozen stream winds through the valley. In the style of traditional Chinese landscape painting.
Autumn maple trees blaze red along a winding river, a small wooden bridge crosses the water, geese fly south in formation. In the style of traditional Chinese landscape painting.
Moonlight reflects on a still lake, willow branches dip into the water, a pavilion stands quietly on the shore. In the style of traditional Chinese landscape painting.
Rolling clouds drift over layered peaks, a winding path leads to a hidden temple, incense smoke curls into the sky. In the style of traditional Chinese landscape painting.
Spring blossoms dot the hillsides, butterflies flutter among peach trees, a gentle stream murmurs through the valley. In the style of traditional Chinese landscape painting.
Vast desert meets distant mountains under a setting sun, a lone rider on horseback casts a long shadow across the dunes. In the style of traditional Chinese landscape painting.
